job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Albin Engineering Services, Inc. (www.aesi.com) is looking for a Software Engineer for one of our premier clients in the San Jose, CA area. This is a permanent position with full benefits!</p><p><br></p><p>Job Responsibilities:</p><ul><li>Design Failure Analysis tools by solving control equipment problems.</li><li>Design and test software on Microsoft Windows Environment to control the operation of automated microscope and scanning systems.</li><li>Design and implement software for acquiring images from frame-grabber data and camera systems.</li></ul><p>Job Requirements:</p><ul><li>Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or similar.</li><li>2+ years experience with Visual Studio</li><li>2+ years experience developing in C# and C++ language to develop/debug Windows desktop application.</li><li>Knowledge and experience of WPF.</li><li>Understanding of Semiconductor devices and software development experience in Microscope and Semiconductor probing tools is highly desirable.</li></ul>
